name: Bandits and Bounties Combat Demo
description:
Bandits and Bounties is a Spaghetti Western themed Action-RPG inspired by movies like The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, Sartana, and Death Rides a Horse.

This is an early alpha demo which primarily features the game's combat. You can chose from three pre made characters who all have the same goal: Kill Killer Pete.

The game is currently on Kickstarter.
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim/Shoot

Q - Draw Gun

E - Talk (Hold to open information menu)

M - Mute
